original_title: Marek Edelman… i była miłość w getcie
overview: Shortly before his death, Marek Edelman (1919-2009), former commander of the Warsaw Ghetto Uprising (1943) against the Nazi occupation, wonders about several basic themes of human existence in relation to the Shoah: how was it possible to enjoy love, tenderness, passion and lust while the whole world was crumbling and burning around.
title: Marek Edelman… And There Was Love in the Ghetto
